description:
Freelancing is becoming a major work model in the world of work. One site that has helped many freelancers establish their careers is Elance.

Some freelancers have made Elance their main source of revenue while others have made it just one part of their career. This course can help understand the basics and develop strategies to use the site effectively.

The course is developed into three parts. The first part consists of identifying your marketable skills for Elance and how to start your portfolio.

The second part examines tips on finding work and developing proposals. Part three looks at ways to make Elance a long term part of your career.

Whether you are just getting started on the site or just need to reexamine your strategy for work on the site, this course can help you.
title: Elance Profits: Become A Successful Freelancer With Elance
